medical_history.chief_complaint: Chest pain and ST-segment elevations on electrocardiography (ECG).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at approximately 8:30 AM when the patient was found unresponsive at home. He regained consciousness shortly after and reported chest pain and dizziness. His chest pain was rated at 7 out of 10.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease, hypertension, dyslipidemia, history of unstable angina, previous bare-metal stent placement, and two drug-eluting stents placed due to obstructing lesions.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of coronary artery disease.
medical_history.social_history: Divorced, lives with girlfriend, visits from children, works in construction and entertainment, drinks alcohol in moderation, and stopped smoking 11 years earlier.
